message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a deep learning architecture for action detection and segmentation in videos, which is a problem related to computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of 3D convolutional neural networks, which is a popular technique in deep learning for video analysis, and the use of encoder-decoder structures, which are commonly used in image segmentation tasks. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) are also likely sub-categories.
